DOC.brief_summary: The 5-milligram ( mg ) dose prasugrel low body weight ( LBW ) patient coronary artery disease produce pharmacodynamic response within therapeutic range 10-mg dose high body weight ( HBW ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Prasugrel Clopidogrel Low Body Weight Versus Higher Body Weight With Coronary Artery Disease
